title: Lord of the Gaming World - Novel Updates
author: A night of Green smoke
description:
Farming, recruitment, fighting for power... All the players are trapped in the game of 'Feudal Lords'. Civilizations fought for domination. 

Civilian military commanders, Tang Dynastyâ€™s Mo Sword Team, Seven Thousand White Robes, Ninja Warriors, Roman legions, medieval knights, Indian elephant soldiers... all galloping on the prairie! 

The protagonist of East Han just wanted to farm, but he received a success system. The diplomats of Tang Dynasty, the Great Wall of China, Unity of Thirteen States, incredible accomplishments... Unlock achievements to get rich rewards.>
